name: The Demigod
description:
A mother is destined to protect her baby that is the son of a god. You have to protect the baby while fighting against the ghouls in the cave to get into your Home.

Note : Do pick up the baby by pressing "E" on the carriage.

Controls :

"E" to pick up the baby at the carriage

"E" again to change to the sword to defend yourself.

**This is also my very first game so please be nice. I hope that its okay, so do please tell me how to improve myself :)
